original_title: 真田くノ一忍法伝 かすみ 愛と裏切りの絆
overview: It's been two years since Kasumi chose the Kunoichi lifestyle and she now has a new enemy in Hattori Hanzo. Hanzo's wish is to penetrate the Ueda castle. So he enlists his own Kunoichi to seduce the gatekeeper, probing him for security loopholes.
title: Lady Ninja Kasumi 2: Love and Betrayal
